sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Button, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; import PageHeader from './pageheader.js' import '../styles/registration.scss' import '../styles/modals.scss' import SignatureCanvas from 'react-signature-canvas' class RegistrationForm extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { showForm: false, firstName: "", middleName: "", lastName: "", titleName: "", homeAddress: "", cityNameH: "Hanover", zipCodeH: "03755", streetNum: 0, streetName: "", aptNum: "", cityNameM: "", stateNameM: "", zipCodeM: "", phoneNum: "", emailAddress: "", }; this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this); this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); } toggleShowForm = () => { this.setState(prevState => ({ showForm: !prevState.showForm, })); } handleChange = (event) => { this.setState({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value }); } handleSubmit = (event) => { console.log("ok we made it to the submission"); console.log(this.state) this.toggleShowForm(); } showFormModal = () => { return ( Absentee Ballot Application Name

First Name:

Middle Name:

Last Name:

Title (Jr., Sr., II, III) (N/A if nothing):

Address Information
This is where you last registered to vote, if you don't know, please put your last dorm number and name.

Home Address:

(ex: '307 Richardson Hall' or '3 Ivy Lane')


This is where your ballot will be mailed. Due to uncertainty regarding when the mail will be sent, please list where you will be at the end of August

Street Number/P.O. Box:

Street Name:

Apt/Unit Name (N/A if nothing):

City/Town:

State:

Zip Code:

Contact Information

Phone Number:

Email Address:

Signature:

) } //want to add an "are you sure you want to submit" render() { return ( <>

Click the following button to fill out an absentee ballot! Note that once the form is complete, the application will automatically be submitted, and you will receive a ballot at your given address

{this.showFormModal()} ); } } export default RegistrationForm
